casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY AS TRUSTEE FOR FIRST FRANKLIN MORTGAGE LOAN TRUST 2006-FF9, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-FF9, Plaintiff,
v.
Brian Lamont FERGUSON; Xavier Milton Earquhart a/k/a Milton Xavier a/k/a Xavier Milton, Individually and as Trustee of the Ferguson Family Irrevocable Trust of 2015; CSH 2016-1 Borrower, LLC ; Wilmington Savings Fund Society, FSB, d/b/a Christiana Trust, as Trustee for the Registered Holders of Colony Starwood Homes 2016-1 Trust Single-Family Rental Pass-Through Certificates; TD Service Financial Corporation, Defendants. No. COA18-1278 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: July 16, 2019

AFFIRMED.
